title: Job Vacancies at Kels Global Ventures
content:
Kels global ventures is a recruitment company that seeks to provide business solutions to satisfy her clients needs.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Secretary / Personal Assistant

Job Location: Kado, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a highly organized, detail-oriented, and experienced Director's Secretary and Personal Assistant to provide administrative support to our senior leadership team.
	The successful candidate will be responsible for managing the Director's schedule, handling confidential matters, and ensuring the smooth operation of the office.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage the Director's schedule, including scheduling meetings, appointments, and travel arrangements.
	Prepare and edit correspondence, reports, and presentations.
	Handle confidential and sensitive matters with discretion.
	Provide administrative support, including answering phone calls, responding to emails, and greeting visitors.
	Maintain organized filing systems, both physical and digital.
	Coordinate meetings, conferences, and special events.
	Develop and implement administrative processes to improve efficiency.
	Build and maintain relationships with internal and external stakeholders.


Requirements


	Proven experience as an Executive Secretary, Personal Assistant, or similar role.
	Excellent organizational, communication, and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to maintain confidentiality and handle sensitive information.
	Strong attention to detail and ability to prioritize tasks.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office and other productivity software.
	Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and adapt to changing priorities.


Skills:


	Administrative and secretarial skills.
	Time management and organizational skills.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	Confidentiality and discretion.
	Technical skills, including Microsoft Office.


We Offer


	Competitive salary (N120,000 - N150,000) and benefits package.
	Opportunity to work in a dynamic and growing organization.
	Professional development and training opportunities.


Application Closing Date: 19th September, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: kelsgloballtd@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: For more, WhatsApp: 09136342350.

 

2.) Cashier

Job Location: Kado, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a detail-oriented and customer-focused Healthcare Cashier to join our team.
	As a Healthcare Cashier, you will be responsible for managing patient billing, payments, and financial transactions in a fast-paced healthcare environment.
	You will provide excellent customer service, ensure accuracy and efficiency in financial transactions, and maintain confidentiality and compliance with healthcare regulations.


Key Responsibilities


	Process patient payments, insurance claims, and billing statements accurately and efficiently.
	Manage patient accounts, including posting charges, payments, and adjustments.
	Provide excellent customer service to patients, families, and healthcare providers.
	Resolve billing issues and answer patient inquiries in a professional and courteous manner.
	Maintain confidentiality and compliance with healthcare regulations, including HIPAA.
	Perform daily cash handling duties, including balancing cash drawers and reconciling discrepancies.
	Collaborate with other departments to resolve billing and payment issues.


Requirements


	High school diploma or equivalent required; associate's degree or certification in a related field preferred.
	Previous experience in a healthcare environment.
	Basic knowledge of medical billing and insurance procedures.
	Excellent communication skills.
	Ability to work accurately and efficiently in a fast-paced environment.
	Familiarity with healthcare software and systems.


Skills:


	Cash handling and billing procedures.
	Medical terminology and insurance knowledge.
	Excellent customer service and communication skills.
	Ability to work in a fast-paced environment.


What we Offer


	Salary: N90,000 - N100,000 per month.
	Salary and benefits package.
	Opportunity to work in a dynamic healthcare organization.
	Professional development and training opportunities.


Application Closing Date: 18th September, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: kelsgloballtd@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: For more enquires send message via WhatsApp number 09136342350.

 

 

3.) Medical Sales Representative (Physical Rehabilitation)

Job Location: Kado, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Hospital Representative to identify and refer patients with physical rehabilitation needs, such as stroke, head injury, and spinal cord injury, for intermediate inpatient admission to our facility.
	The ideal candidate will have a strong network of healthcare professionals and facilities, excellent communication skills, and a passion for delivering high-quality patient care.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and maintain relationships with healthcare professionals, hospitals, and rehabilitation facilities to identify potential patients with physical rehabilitation needs.
	Source and refer patients with conditions such as stroke, head injury, and spinal cord injury for intermediate inpatient admission to our facility.
	Provide education and information about our facility's services and programs to healthcare professionals and patients' families.
	Collaborate with healthcare teams to ensure seamless transitions and continuity of care for referred patients.
	Meet or exceed referral targets and contribute to the growth of our physical rehabilitation program.


Requirements


	Strong network of healthcare professionals and facilities.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to work independently and build relationships.
	Knowledge of physical rehabilitation services and programs.
	Relevant experience in healthcare sales, marketing, or business development.


We Offer


	Salary N200,000 plus other benefits package.
	Opportunity to work in a dynamic and growing healthcare organization.
	Professional development and training opportunities.


Application Closing Date: 20th September, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: kelsgloballtd@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: For more enquires send message via WhatsApp number 09136342350.

title: Job Openings at CVM Career Company
content:
CVM Career Company (A career consulting company) - We help professionals like you use their career stories to land job interviews by writing functional CV and Resumes and we also provide them with tools to navigate the world of work through our various coaching services.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Accountant

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos 

Job Description


	Our client company is seeking for an Accountant to manage all financial transactions, from fixed payments and variable expenses to bank deposits and budgets.


Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Manage all accounting transactions and prepare budget forecasts.
	Publish financial statements on time and handle monthly, quarterly and annual closings.
	Ensure timely bank payments and computes taxes and prepare tax returns.
	Audit financial transactions/documents and reinforce financial data.
	Comply with financial policies and regulations.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Accounting or any finance-related course.
	1-2 years of experience in accounting/finance.
	Excellent knowledge of accounting regulations and procedures including Generally Accepted Accounting Principles (GAAP)
	Hands-on experience with accounting software like FreshBooks and Quickbooks
	ICAN is a plus.


Salary
N180,000 / Month.

Application Closing Date: 18th September, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and cover letter to: cvmakeover.cv@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Only candidates on the island should apply.

 

 

2.) Head of Finance and Accounts

Job Location: Mowe, Ogun

Job Description


	We are seeking an experienced and detail-oriented Head of Finance & Accounts to oversee the financial health and sustainability of our healthcare facility.
	The ideal candidate will combine strong technical accounting skills with the ability to provide strategic financial leadership in a dynamic and fast-paced healthcare environment.


Key Responsibilities


	Lead all aspects of financial management, including budgeting, forecasting, and reporting.
	Oversee daily finance and accounting operations, including accounts payable/receivable, payroll, and reconciliations.
	Ensure compliance with statutory regulations, tax obligations, and internal policies.
	Develop financial strategies to support growth, cost efficiency, and long-term sustainability.
	Manage financial audits and liaise with auditors, banks, regulators, and other stakeholders.
	Provide financial insights to senior management for informed decision-making.
	Implement and monitor internal controls to safeguard organizational assets.
	Supervise and mentor the finance team to build capacity and improve performance.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field (Master’s degree or professional certification preferred – ICAN, ACCA, CFA).
	Minimum of 7 years of progressive finance/accounting experience, with at least 3 years in a supervisory or head role.
	Strong knowledge of financial regulations, tax laws, and healthcare/NGO accounting practices.
	Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and leadership skills.
	Proficiency in accounting software and advanced MS Excel.
	High level of integrity, accountability, and attention to detail.


Application Closing Date: 15th September, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and cover letter to: cvmakeover.cv@gmail.com using “Head of Finance & Accounts Application” as the subject of the email.

 

 

3.) Senior Human Resources Officer

Job Locations: Lagos & Mowe, Ogun

Job Summary


	We are seeking a proactive and highly organized Senior Human Resources (HR) Officer to join our growing healthcare team.
	The Senior HR Officer will play a key role in managing day-to-day HR operations while also driving strategic initiatives that enhance staff engagement, compliance, and organizational performance.


Key Responsibilities


	Oversee end-to-end HR operations, including recruitment, onboarding, payroll support, and employee records management.
	Provide guidance to managers and staff on HR policies, procedures, and labor law compliance.
	Lead employee relations, grievance handling, and disciplinary processes in line with organizational policies.
	Support training and development programs, including planning, coordination, and tracking of learning initiatives.
	Monitor staff attendance, leave management, and workforce planning to ensure optimal staffing levels.
	Drive performance management processes, including appraisals and KPI tracking.
	Collaborate with leadership to strengthen workplace culture, employee engagement, and retention.
	Prepare HR reports, analytics, and insights for management decision-making.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources Management, Business Administration, or a related field.
	Minimum of 5 years of progressive HR experience, preferably in a healthcare or service-focused organization.
	Strong knowledge of Nigerian labor laws and HR best practices.
	Excellent communication, interpersonal, and conflict-resolution skills.
	Proficiency in HR software/HRIS and Microsoft Office tools.
	High sense of integrity, confidentiality, and professionalism.
	Membership of CIPM or other HR professional body (preferred).


Application Closing Date: 15th September, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: cvmakeover.cv@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Customer Care / Sales Officer Job at Zenith Carex International Limited




        
    

        
        Zenith Carex International Limited was incorporated on 1st November 2002,under the 1968 Companies Acts of the Federal Republic of Nigeria, under registration RC 465705. We have, in line with our vision, already taken a front-line position in the air express industry in less than a decade since our commencement of operations. We have cut a niche as the air express company that can depend upon not only to keep with the terms of our services but more often to exceed customers expectations. Zenith Carex International was established to offer unique air express mail and freight delivery services to our clients in new and innovative ways that would mark a clear departure from existing methods.
     

            
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Care / Sales Officer

Job Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Provide client support and handle client communications effectively.
	Discuss business contracts and costs with clients.
	Build connections on behalf of the company.
	Ability to market by opening and closing deals.
	Maintain existing clients and generate new clients to achieve revenue goals.
	Identifying new business markets and recording daily customer transactions.
	Handle clients' complaints, provide appropriate solutions and alternatives within the time limits.
	Must-have flare for sales.
	Ability to work with less supervision.
	Maintain up-to-date knowledge about company products and services.
	Keep records of clients interactions, process clients account and file documents.
	Provide accurate, valid and complete information by using the right methods/tools.
	Create frequent reviews and reports with sales and financial data.
	Ability to make presentations on products and services
	Initiate deals.
	Identify target markets.


Requirements


	B.Sc Degree / HND in Marketing / Business Administration / Sales or a relevant field.
	Must have at least 3 years of work experience in sales/client relationships with a track record.
	Female Candidates only
	Experience in logistics is an added advantage.
	Experience in marketing will be an advantage.
	Must be living in Surulereor its environs
	Must pay attention to details.
	Good record-keeping skills.
	Excellent customer service skills.
	Must have integrity.
	Must be courteous and presentable.
	Should be able to work with less supervision.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@zenithcarex.com using "Customer Care / Sales Officer - Surulere" as the subject of the mail.
